 2022-09482022-09-15,  MHA,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of VAUGHAN DOWIE of Toronto, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective December 1, 2022.
